scripts.synth-manager: npm run build-s3resolver && cdk synth --path-metadata false --version-reporting false --app "npx ts-node src/manager/index.ts" | ts-node bin/write.ts dist/cfn/manager.yaml
scripts.publish-stack: npm run synth-manager && npm run pack && zip -jr dist.zip ddcp.zip dist/cfn/manager.yaml && cdk deploy --path-metadata false --version-reporting false --app "npx ts-node src/publish/PublishPipelineStack.ts"
scripts.build-s3resolver: npx tsc -p config/tsconfig.s3resolver.json && cat dist/s3resolver/node_modules/**/*.js dist/s3resolver/src/s3resolver/index.js | sed 's#require("cfn-response")#exports#' | jsmin > dist/s3resolver/index.js
scripts.pack: rm -rf dist/synthesis && npm run build && npx npm-pack-zip
